resources.string: Quick News is a simple android app that aims at providing latest news from various news sources in a concise manner.
Currently Quick News provide news from 58 news sources around the globe. Our only goal is to make user more and more informed about what\'s going on globally.
Quick News is also an Open Source Project. You can check out the code base at https://github.com/Abhey/QuickNews . So feel free to contribute.
All the bug reports and feature request must be submitted by mailing at- abheyranacool123.ar@gmail.com . We ensure you that your request will be entertained in future version of app.
